title: 1 acts ethically
answer: to enable them work out together, and to work out the best product, to make sure all the team members feels valued, to get the best work out of team.

title: ethical body
answer: He has ethical guidelines to know, so he does not have to decide what is ethical it’s written down. Also, They provide help and support, for instance if he needs legal advice. In addition, they run training courses to keep his skills up to date.

title: act ethically
answer: He can tell the manager he has not used it, perform his own research on how to use it, can explain to the manager that he needs additional training, or ask for a mentor, practice at home before starting.

title: acted unethically
answer: He didn’t act in best interest of product, because the product might fail because he didn’t report the error. He didn’t act in best interest of client, because if the product does not work then they have been let down because he didn’t report the error. Also, he didn’t act in the best interest of the profession, he is letting his profession down because he didn’t report the error. In addition, he didn’t act in best interest of the company, it not correcting the error early could lead to later problems.
